info.title: TD SYNNEX Partner API
info.description:
These APIs provide comprehensive access to product information, order management, and other business operations for seamless integration with your applications. With these services, you can perform price and availability queries, submit purchase orders, manage invoices, and more, all in real time.

 - Click [Download JSON Schema](/api-center/public/api/project/cis-partner-api/swagger/prod/download) to import into your API management tool (e.g., Postman).

tags.name: Orders
tags.description: Endpoints related to order processing and queries

tags.name: Invoices
tags.description: Endpoints for accessing invoice information and reports

tags.name: Price & Availability
tags.description: Real-time product pricing and inventory endpoints

get.summary: Partner Invoice Query By InvoiceNo And InvoiceType
get.description: Retrieve invoice information using the invoice number and type.

post.description:
Retrieve real-time pricing and inventory availability for products.

## Features:
- Query by TD SYNNEX SKU or Manufacturer Part Number
- Support for multiple SKUs in a single request (recommended limit: 50)
- Returns pricing based on customer contract
- Shows availability across all TD SYNNEX warehouses
- Special pricing support (Education, Government, Promotions)

## Response Times:
- 1 SKU: ~0.5-1 second
- 5 SKUs: ~1-1.5 seconds
- Response times may be longer during peak hours

single_sku.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<priceResponse>
    <PriceAvailabilityList>
        <synnexSKU>439866</synnexSKU>
        <mfgPN>108R00645</mfgPN>
        <mfgCode>13439</mfgCode>
        <status>Active</status>
        <description>IMAGING UNIT, PHASER 6300/6350</description>
        <GlobalProductStatusCode>Active</GlobalProductStatusCode>
        <price>322.97</price>
        <totalQuantity>240</totalQuantity>
        <AvailabilityByWarehouse>
            <warehouseInfo>
                <number>6</number>
                <zipcode>60446</zipcode>
                <city>Romeoville,IL</city>
                <addr>1180 Remington Blvd</addr>
            </warehouseInfo>
            <qty>30</qty>
        </AvailabilityByWarehouse>
        <AvailabilityByWarehouse>
            <warehouseInfo>
                <number>7</number>
                <zipcode>38672</zipcode>
                <city>Southaven,MS</city>
                <addr>455 Research Drive Suite 100</addr>
            </warehouseInfo>
            <qty>25</qty>
        </AvailabilityByWarehouse>
        <AvailabilityByWarehouse>
            <warehouseInfo>
                <number>12</number>
                <zipcode>91710</zipcode>
                <city>Chino,CA</city>
                <addr>15065 Flight Ave</addr>
            </warehouseInfo>
            <qty>45</qty>
        </AvailabilityByWarehouse>
        <lineNumber>1</lineNumber>
    </PriceAvailabilityList>
</priceResponse>

post.description:
Retrieve inventory availability without pricing information.


This endpoint is optimized for faster response times when pricing is not needed.

It returns the same structure as the Price & Availability endpoint but with
empty price fields.


## Use Cases:

- Inventory checks when pricing is already cached

- Faster response times for availability-only queries

- Reduced processing overhead

single_sku.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<priceResponse>
    <PriceAvailabilityList>
        <synnexSKU>439866</synnexSKU>
        <mfgPN>108R00645</mfgPN>
        <mfgCode>13439</mfgCode>
        <status>Active</status>
        <description>IMAGING UNIT, PHASER 6300/6350</description>
        <GlobalProductStatusCode>Active</GlobalProductStatusCode>
        <price></price>
        <totalQuantity>240</totalQuantity>
        <AvailabilityByWarehouse>
            <warehouseInfo>
                <number>6</number>
                <zipcode>60446</zipcode>
                <city>Romeoville,IL</city>
                <addr>1180 Remington Blvd</addr>
            </warehouseInfo>
            <qty>30</qty>
        </AvailabilityByWarehouse>
        <lineNumber>1</lineNumber>
    </PriceAvailabilityList>
</priceResponse>
